label: 綾師
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Official designers of the Weaving Office (Oribe-no-tsukasa) who supervised the weaving of patterns in brocades and damasks. Some were sent to the provinces (kuni) to teach the people their art. [織部司、国]
